services.title: What does DRK LAB do?
services.description: DRK LAB blends a rental warehouse with a 3D lab. We spot real on-set problems and design specific parts so they stop being problems.

items.title: 3D design for shoots
items.text: Parts built for everyday work: protections, caps, mounts, adapters and solutions you won't find in manufacturers' catalogues.

items.title: Printing with technical materials
items.text: High-quality PLA, fibre-reinforced compounds and materials made to handle impacts, heat and on-set abuse.

items.title: Rapid prototyping for rentals and production
items.text: From problem to functional part in a few days, with fast iterations until the fit is perfect.

featured.title: Featured products
featured.description: A selection of parts already working daily in rentals and crews.

custom.title: Custom parts for your team
custom.description: Need a specific part for a camera, monitor or light? DRK LAB can design and manufacture a solution tailored to your workflow.
items: · Adapters and mounts for cameras and accessories.
· Parts that are discontinued or never existed.

about.title: Who's behind DRK LAB?
about.description: DRK LAB is the personal project of Fran, an audiovisual technician and cinematographer. Working daily with cameras, lenses and lights in a rental, I've seen first-hand what breaks, what's lost and what's missing in the cases. That's where DRK LAB parts come from: small solutions solving very specific problems.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you're a rental, production company or freelance technician and have an idea or on-set problem, write me and let's talk.
